articles.title: Etienne Bacher

articles.contents:
Projects





tinyslider


Adaptation into R of the Javascript library tiny-slider.js. This package creates carousels in interactive environments, such as R Shiny.

See more





docsifier


Use this package to build a webpage for your package/project documentation. It is the adaptation of docsify.js.

See more





prompter


This package allows to easily add tooltips to HTML elements in R Shiny applications. It uses hint.css under the hood.

See more





circletyper


Curve text elements in R Shiny applications, using Circletype.js.

See more
